languages.text: {n}Маражай сумрачным, затуманенным взглядом окидывает кровавый след, протянувшийся за вашей спиной. Уголок его рта дергается, но он не улыбается — вместо этого он выдыхает, едва подрагивающей рукой стирает красное с лица и медленно поворачивает голову к вам.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай сумрачным, затуманенным взглядом окидывает кровавый след, протянувшийся за вашей спиной. Уголок его рта дергается, но он не улыбается — вместо этого он выдыхает, едва подрагивающей рукой стирает красное с лица и медленно поворачивает голову к вам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋冷酷、涣散的目光沿着你身后的血迹朝远处看去。他的嘴角微微抽动，但那并不是笑容。相反，他长出一口气，用微微颤抖的手抹去了脸上的殷红，然后缓缓转向你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋冷酷、涣散的目光沿着你身后的血迹朝远处看去。他的嘴角微微抽动，但那并不是笑容。相反，他长出一口气，用微微颤抖的手抹去了脸上的殷红，然后缓缓转向你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La sombría mirada perdida de Marazhai sigue el rastro de sangre que has dejado tras de ti. Se le crispa la comisura de los labios, pero no llega a sonreír; en vez de eso deja escapar un suspiro, se enjuga las manchas carmesí del rostro con una mano ligeramente temblorosa y vuelve la cabeza muy despacio para mirarte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La sombría mirada perdida de Marazhai sigue el rastro de sangre que has dejado tras de ti. Se le crispa la comisura de los labios, pero no llega a sonreír; en vez de eso deja escapar un suspiro, se enjuga las manchas carmesí del rostro con una mano ligeramente temblorosa y vuelve la cabeza muy despacio para mirarte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai observe d'un œil morne et distrait la traînée de sang qui s'étire derrière vous. Les coins de sa bouche frémissent légèrement, sans pour autant former un sourire. Il laisse finalement échapper un soupir, essuie le sang de son visage d'une main peu assurée et se tourne lentement vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai observe d'un œil morne et distrait la traînée de sang qui s'étire derrière vous. Les coins de sa bouche frémissent légèrement, sans pour autant former un sourire. Il laisse finalement échapper un soupir, essuie le sang de son visage d'une main peu assurée et se tourne lentement vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhais grimmiger, zielloser Blick folgt der Blutspur, die sich hinter dir erstreckt. Sein Mundwinkel zuckt, aber er lächelt nicht – stattdessen atmet er tief durch, wischt sich mit leicht zitternden Hand das Rot aus dem Gesicht und dreht seinen Kopf langsam zu dir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais grimmiger, zielloser Blick folgt der Blutspur, die sich hinter dir erstreckt. Sein Mundwinkel zuckt, aber er lächelt nicht – stattdessen atmet er tief durch, wischt sich mit leicht zitternden Hand das Rot aus dem Gesicht und dreht seinen Kopf langsam zu dir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの険しく、焦点の定まらない視線が、あなたの背後に広がる血の跡を追う。口の端がピクリと動くが、微笑むことはない。その代わりに息を吐き、わずかに震える手で顔の紅を拭い、ゆっくりとあなたの方へと顔を向ける。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの険しく、焦点の定まらない視線が、あなたの背後に広がる血の跡を追う。口の端がピクリと動くが、微笑むことはない。その代わりに息を吐き、わずかに震える手で顔の紅を拭い、ゆっくりとあなたの方へと顔を向ける。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın düşünceden yoksun, gaddar bakışları; ardında uzanan kan izini takip ediyor. Dudağının kenarı titrese de gülümsemiyor. Bunun yerine nefesini vererek hafifçe titreyen eliyle yüzündeki kızıl lekeyi siliyor ve kafasını yavaşça sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's grim, unfocused gaze tracks along the trail of blood that stretches out behind you. The corner of his mouth twitches, but he does not smile — instead, he lets out a breath, wipes the crimson from his face with a slightly trembling hand, and slowly turns his head toward you.{/n}
